summary: The first dance of dragons happened because a lot of circumstances not because they both have “different approaches of ruling”,...
body:
How would a second dance of dragons between dany and Jon would serve to the overall ending and made it “groundbreaking”? For me it’s full of bullshit

The first dance of dragons happened because a lot of circumstances not because they both have “different approaches of ruling”, the first dance of dragons was the direct result of Viserys naming her first born daughter Rhaenyra has his heir but her stepmother (and Aegon‘s mother) wanted his son (Rhaenyra’s half brother) to be King. So their disrespected Viserys’s will and crowned Aegon like king while Rhaenyra was in Dragonstone.

This was the triggering stone in the dance of dragons conflict. Aside from that Rhaenyra and Aegon were already marry with their own children so it was imposible they could have set aside their differences and marry (that is why when the war ended they marry Rhaenyra’s son “Aegon III with Aegon II’s daughter” and they disliked each other because Rhaenyra felt her brother was usurping her crown and their father ‘s will.

How then you all gonna expect a second dance of dragons between Jon and Daenerys because apparently Jon is all so goodie ruler and Daenerys is so such evil queen agenda. What do you want then? Jon to steal Rhaegal and mount him into battle against Daenerys’s Drogo? Because surely that really worked well the last time in which ALL dragons ended up dead.

And both Aegon and Rhaenyra died too

summary: No means to offend you, but D&D also favors Snsa, and you can see this on their comms about Dany burning the Tarllys, they...
question: No means to offend you, but D&D also favors Snsa, and you can see this on their comms about Dany burning the Tarllys, they activately said that Dany was cruel, and compared to Snsa executing Petyr, saying she was sympathetic in comparison to Danys reaction. Fans are right worrying about D&D dumbening Dany only to make Snsa miss moral superiority out of their asses. And about HBO favorating Dany, I am afraid is more just marketing strategy since she  is the official mascot of GOT and HBO
answer:
Sorry you want to tell me that D&D favourite is Sansa more than Dany? Are you living alternative world?🙄🙄🙄

D&D never said that Dany is cruel. NEVER… They loves Dany so much. She is one of their biggest favorite. And they enjoy to work with this character. They love how iconic Dany is.

D&D always calls Dany “Heir if Iron Throne”… queen of Seven kingdom”

Everywhere: they mentioned it too Bafta Ceremony when they gave awords to Emilia… their words were “queen of the seven kingdom “

Dany is one and only queen for them. Cersei is interesting character for them. They love to work about Cersei.

Nobody is in Dany’s fandom afraid that D&D makes Sansa more cool girl than Dany. We all know who is their favorite character. They always worked the hardest than other characters . “ mother of Dragons” is D&D s favourite name in whole asoiaf. They really adores Dany. They gifted Dmilia ear rings “MOD” initials what means “Mother Of Dragons” as their favourite character.

D&D loves Sansa and they gave her another character’s storyline from book. They didn’t work with GRRM about Sansa. Just took Jane Pool and made chaotic character without logic and logical storyline. They know that Sansa isn’t such an important character. They never worked so hard about her.

In reality D&D favourite characters are Dany and Cersei. This is a reason while they always worked so hard for them. They said one of their conferention that they are dreaming how Cersei win this war. Another time they said same thing about Dany too. Probably they don’t know how makes storyline with this two genial character . This two strongest woman in show.


2 years ago when D&D’s e-mail was hacked and hackers shared this fotos inside Reddit D&D wrote to GRRM. They killed every character to save Cersei and Dany. I remember how quickly was deleted this fotos from everywhere.

GRRM answer was: “Never touch Bran and Arya”


HBO had the largest casting for Daenerys Targaryen than another character. D&D once said that they know that Dany will be the most important character. They changed actress too( Cersei’s actress too). They knew from the first time that Dany <-> Cersei character will be iconic and the most important women in future. They worked so hard about this two.

I remember D&D sait at Baftas. During thousands of people casting HBO president smiled only one time and it was casting for Daenerys. When they Choice Emilia.

Never told me That Sansa is more important character than Dany. Neither D&D loves Sansa more than Dany. It’s absolutely absurd

And GRRM? Great master? Main person? Main creator?

Dany is his greatness 😍 and his words is fire and Blood

Dany wins. Dany is main character why? Because GRRM created Dany from his own story. If she will not win… neither GRRM …

blog.name: lupinusalbus
blog.title: Lupinus Albus
blog.description:
Speculations about Game of Thrones...
(mostly the show)

summary: The Next Dance of Dragons: Theory (Part II)
title: The Next Dance of Dragons: Theory (Part II)
body:
In part I of my theory about the Dance of Dragons, I wrote a little on the background of the first conflict and also why I believe that Game of Thrones is setting up for a second Targaryen internecine war.  This is only speculation on my part.

To expand, there are many reasons for thinking that Jon and Dany are going to end up in conflict.  One of the foremost reasons is Dany’s character in and of itself.  From the time that she hatched the dragons (she states in season 2 that she had a dream about what to do with the eggs), and even before that, retaking the throne as a Targaryen has been her ambition. She believes that she is the rightful heir and that its her destiny to rule the Seven Kingdoms.  From this perspective, it will be very difficult for her to accept that Jon has a better or even a rival claim.  Jon may also have the Targaryen blood, but Dany hatched the dragons; she believes the throne is her birthright. 

The next reason has to do with  the differing leadership styles of Jon and Dany and why Jon will be an attractive leader to some players.  In a nutshell, Dany has the entitled instincts of a conquerer whereas Jon is a uniter who never sought to be a leader.  For all Dany’s talk of “breaking the wheel”, violence is often her preferred tactic in dealing with those who stand in her way.  Examples: crucifying the Masters, burning the Khals; the loot train attack and executions.  While Jon Snow has killed many individuals in battle, apparently his conscience is disturbed about a lot of it.  He has also executed people, but he  appeared to do so reluctantly (and still talks about it as disturbing (see his conversation with Sansa in season 6 episode 4).  We don’t really get this from Dany, leaving us to wonder what “breaking the wheel” actually means.  There are no slaves for her to liberate in Westeros; she kills those who won’t kneel, and she did not hesitate to burn food supplies in the loot train attack.  Therefore, “breaking the wheel” may be a catchphrase that has very little meaning except perhaps to Tyrion because he is hoping Dany will be better than his own family. For more evidence that Jon is a uniter and not a conquerer we have only to look to his efforts to integrate the Wildlings into Westeros and also his forgiveness of the Karstarks and Umbers in the interests of consolidating the North.

As I wrote in Part I, the above is important not only because of how Dany will react to the news of Jon’s parentage, but because of how others are going to perceive Jon vs. Dany as potential claimants once the truth drops. A major theme for both Tyrion and Varys in their support of Dany is their hopes that she is going to be better than the recent and current occupants of the iron Throne.  To this end, Varys’s catchphrase is “serving the realm”, and Tyrion’s is the aforementioned “breaking the wheel”.  So far in the series, both of these mottos appear to be related to a vague kind of progressivism.  Given the actions of Jon and Dany so far, which of the two is actually more progressive?

In part III, I will write about another important aspect of the possible upcoming “Dance of Dragons.”

For more evidence that Jon is a uniter and not a conquerer we have only to look to his efforts to integrate the Wildlings into Westeros and also his forgiveness of the Karstarks and Umbers in the interests of consolidating the North.

As I wrote in Part I, the above is important not only because of how Dany will react to the news of Jon’s parentage, but because of how others are going to perceive Jon vs. Dany as potential claimants once the truth drops. A major theme for both Tyrion and Varys in their support of Dany is their hopes that she is going to be better than the recent and current occupants of the iron Throne.  To this end, Varys’s catchphrase is “serving the realm”, and Tyrion’s is the aforementioned “breaking the wheel”.  So far in the series, both of these mottos appear to be related to a vague kind of progressivism.  Given the actions of Jon and Dany so far, which of the two is actually more progressive?

In part III, I will write about another important aspect of the possible upcoming “Dance of Dragons.”

blog.name: acourtofhopeanddreams
blog.title: Enjoy the little things!
blog.description:
Open your heart
To the love of the world
It only needs one person
Touching it with 
A word
A look
A smile
A kiss

summary: Freezing
title: Freezing
body:
Written for day 2 of @asoiafrarepairs week round 2 based on the prompt “Burning OR Freezing”

When Arya wakes up she notices that it snows and rushes outside, convinced she’s immune to cold. Daenerys, her girlfriend, isn’t so certain about that, but she has never seen snow before.

modern au

“It’s snowing!” Arya rushed to her window and a smile spread across her face when she saw the bright white tapestry in front of her. “Come on! I want to be the first to set foot into it!” She reached for Daenerys’ hand and pulled the girl along down the stairs.

“Dressed like this?” Daenerys raised her eyebrows and freed her hand from Arya’s strong hold. “You will freeze to death!”

Arya rolled her eyes. “Of course not.” She crossed her arms in front of her chest, forgetting for a moment that the Targaryen girl had never seen snow before, had never dealt with the extreme Winter cold before and had every right to be worried about Arya’s well being. “I’m a Stark. We don’t freeze.” She shrugged her shoulders and threw the door towards the garden open.

A shiver rolled down her spine when her bare feet touched the cold snow, but it was a shiver of the good and pleasant kind. Quickly she bent down and filled her hand with snowflakes to watch them melt in her palms. “Father used to love cold winters and layers of snow covering our garden.” She whispered and thought about the pictures in her baby album, showing her with her parents and elder siblings next to a snowman even bigger than she had been at the time.

“I think you’re asking for a cold.” Daenerys unexpectedly appeared behind Arya and when Arya turned around she saw how ridiculous her girlfriend looked. Daenerys wore at least three sweaters and four pairs of socks. The sleeves of her sweaters were folded around her knuckles and her bright white hair was hidden under two hats in the most disgusting colours.

Arya really tried not to laugh, but she lost the fight after not even a second. “There’s no such thing as a cold.” She cocked her head. “It’s a stupid excuse for catching a nasty virus.”

“Actually…” Daenerys locked her glance with Arya’s and smiled an almost mocking smile. “It’s called a cold, because walking around in the cold takes up so much energy that your immune system is weakened. And with a weaker immune system you’re more likely to catch that nasty virus.” She grabbed one of her hats and placed it on Arya’s head.

Just as quickly Arya however grabbed it and took it off again. “I’m a Stark! I’m stronger than Winter!”

“You’re a Stark, yes, but that doesn’t mean you can simply walk around in your thin nightclothes and on bare feet without being punished for it.”

“I can!” Arya stuck out her tongue and to prove her point she sat down on the ground and started the building of a snow man.

She had no idea how much time had passed when the snow man was finally done.

Just like once upon a time the snowman was bigger that Arya herself and he wore the ridiculous hat Daenerys had given her on his head. Little black stones formed his eyes and mouth and the buttons on his belly. For his nose she’d have to ask her mother for a carrot later.

“See?” Arya turned around and smiled when she saw Daenerys with clattering teeth and her arms firmly wrapped around her. “I still don’t feel cold yet. I’m a true Stark.” She stepped back to admire her work once more.

“Is that why your toes are blue?” Daenerys pointed at Arya’s bare feet and Arya shrugged her shoulders when she saw that her toes were indeed a little blueish.

And now Daenerys had mentioned it, maybe they also stung a little, just like her hands and ears. But of course, that was not something Arya would admit, not after all her bragging.

“The snowman needs a nose.” She headed for the door and entered the house again, but as soon as the warmth of her home met with her frozen skin a scream escaped Arya’s lips.

Quickly Daenerys placed both her hands firmly on Arya’s shoulders and shook her. “What’s wrong? What’s happening? Are you okay?”

Arya wanted to nod, but she had to bite her lip to prevent herself from screaming even more and even louder. “It will pass…” She hissed between her teeth and counted to ten, to a hundred, to a thousand.

Eventually the feeling she was burning faded. Her toes, blueish only fifteen minutes ago, were now bright red as if she had taken a way too hot bath. The condition of her fingers wasn’t much better and if she had not known that it was impossible, she would have though that her ears had fallen off too.

“Arya Stark!” Catelyn rushed into the kitchen and shook her head when she saw her daughter, soaked from head to toe and shivering. “How often do I need to tell you that you’re not immune for cold?”

Arya bent her head and she brushed Daenerys’ shoulder when she heard her laugh. “I didn’t die, did I?”

Catelyn raised her eyebrows. “No, but your fingers and toes could have died. Which means that you could have just singlehandedly ended your fencing career.”

Arya felt her cheeks heating up even more when she realised her mother had a point.

“Now, the two of you, get upstairs and take a warm bath.” She winked. “I will give the poor snowman a nose and the rest of the day the two of you will spent on the couch watching Netflix under a few layers of blankets.”

“Excuse me, but I didn’t do anything wrong.” Daenerys spoke softly, but firmly. “I was very well dressed for the occasion.” She lifted her chin and straightened her back.

Catelyn however didn’t let the young girl intimidate her. “You’re supposed to have a good influence on my daughter and you failed.”

“It’s impossible to have any influence at all on your daughter.” Daenerys wrapped an arm around Arya’s shoulders and pecked Arya’s cheek. “That’s one of the many reasons why I’ve fallen in love with her.”

Catelyn curled her lips up into a smile. “Then you won’t mind keeping her company while she sits out her punishment either.”

tags: god these people are so annoying
summary: 'aRyA dOeSnT cArE aBoUt ThE sMaLlFoLk!', baby girl dead ass beat joffery baratheon over the head with a stick because he was...
body:
‘aRyA dOeSnT cArE aBoUt ThE sMaLlFoLk!’, baby girl dead ass beat joffery baratheon over the head with a stick because he was torturing her friend- a butchers boy, need I remind you, then proceeded to swing his sword into the river so he couldn’t hurt her friend any more than he already had. Befriends nearly everyone she meets, sleeps and eats with the common folk, does her best to protect them and serves justice to those who would hurt them.


‘dEaNeRyS dOeSnT cArE aBoUt ThE sMaLlFoLk!’ sweetie pie took many women and young girls under her protection as a khaleesi to prevent them from being raped. Legit freed thousands upon thousands of small folk and actual slaves (with no other motive than freeing them from their binds), continues to do her best to keep them safe and punishes those who would do them harm or put them back in chains.

summary: GoT rant
body:
GoT rant

I’m not being funny but it’s the LAST EVER SEASON of Game of Thrones in a few months, why is there still people out there licking the arses of characters and hating on others?? Yeah have your favs, have your ships but have them without shitting on other people’s favs and ships. This is the time we as a fandom should be coming together to see off Thrones with mutual love and andmiration for the show, not hating each other just because they like different characters, GoT wouldn’t be GoT without EVERY SINGLE CHARACTER, good, bad or evil. So people need to grow up and stop being petty because once Thrones is gone, it’s fucking gone and the lasting taste of this amazing creation shouldn’t be tainted cause it’s fans can’t get along.

summary: Dany could hear the singing of the red priests as they lit their night fires and the shouts of ragged children playing games...
text: Dany could hear the singing of the red priests as they lit their night fires and the shouts of ragged children playing games beyond the walls of the estate. For a moment she wished she could be out there with them, barefoot and breathless and dressed in tatters, with no past and no future and no feast to attend at Khal Drogo’s manse.

blog.name: andyastvthoughts
blog.title: TV thoughts
blog.description: Hey there, my name is Andromeda Auburn. I'm not a writer, or a film critic, or the most interesting person in the world. Mainly I sit at home and watch TV. I figured that if I am going to be sitting here doing nothing I might as well be doing something slightly productive. From here on I am going to try and write my thoughts on the show(s) I am currently watching. So !!SPOILER!! Hope you enjoy my mindless rambling and keep reading.
